argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.k | |- K = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 4 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |

| 7 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.m | |- .* = ( .s ` C ) |
| 8 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.e | |- .^ = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) |
| 9 |  | mat2pmatscmxcl.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( M e. K /\ L e. NN0 ) ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 11 | 4 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( M e. K /\ L e. NN0 ) ) -> P e. Ring ) |

| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |

| 19 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. K ) <-> ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ M e. K ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( M e. K /\ L e. NN0 ) ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. K ) ) |
| 21 | 3, 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 | #P_mat2pmatbas0 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. K ) -> ( T ` M ) e. B ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( M e. K /\ L e. NN0 ) ) -> ( T ` M ) e. B ) |
| 23 | 14, 5, 6, 7 | #P_matvscl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ P e. Ring ) /\ ( ( L .^ X ) e. ( Base ` P ) /\ ( T ` M ) e. B ) ) -> ( ( L .^ X ) .* ( T ` M ) ) e. B ) |
| 24 | 10, 12, 16, 22, 23 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( M e. K /\ L e. NN0 ) ) -> ( ( L .^ X ) .* ( T ` M ) ) e. B ) |
